name: dumb
content:
dumb adjective
(SILENT)
C1 old-fashioned offensive unable to speak: Children like this used to be described as "deaf and dumb".
temporarily unable to speak, for example because you are very surprised or shocked: She was struck dumb by what she had seen.

(DEVICE)
A dumb device cannot connect to the internet, or cannot operate independently using computer technology: Radio receivers were dumb devices - copper coils, essentially. The kit turns a dumb bomb into a smart bomb by attaching a GPS system. See also
